languages.text: "В таком случае молись Великому, чтобы Фалько перед смертью подтвердил твои слова". {n}Джай разочарованно убирает руку с оружия и виновато склоняет перед вами голову.{/n} "Простите мою дерзость, шерин. Он весь ваш".

traits.locale_text: "В таком случае молись Великому, чтобы Фалько перед смертью подтвердил твои слова". {n}Джай разочарованно убирает руку с оружия и виновато склоняет перед вами голову.{/n} "Простите мою дерзость, шерин. Он весь ваш".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "In that case, pray to the Exalted One that Falco backs up your story before he dies." {n}Disappointed, Jae takes her hand off her weapon and bows her head before you penitently.{/n} "Forgive me my brazenness, shereen. He's all yours."
languages.original_text: "В таком случае молись Великому, чтобы Фалько перед смертью подтвердил твои слова". {n}Джай разочарованно убирает руку с оружия и виновато склоняет перед вами голову.{/n} "Простите мою дерзость, шерин. Он весь ваш".

traits.locale_text: "In that case, pray to the Exalted One that Falco confirms what you said before he dies." {n}Disappointed, Jae takes her hand off her weapon and bows her head before you penitently.{/n} "Forgive me my brazenness, shereen. He's all yours."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "In that case, pray to the Exalted One that Falco confirms what you said before he dies." {n}Disappointed, Jae takes her hand off her weapon and bows her head before you penitently.{/n} "Forgive me my brazenness, shereen. He's all yours."

traits.locale_text: "In that case, pray to the Exalted One that Falco confirms what you said before he dies." {n}Disappointed, Jae takes her hand off her weapon and bows her head before you penitently.{/n} "Forgive me my brazenness, shereen. He's all yours."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "In that case, pray to the Exalted One that Falco confirms what you said before he dies." {n}Disappointed, Jae takes her hand off her weapon and bows her head before you penitently.{/n} "Forgive me my brazenness, shereen. He's all yours."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "In that case, pray to the Exalted One that Falco backs up your story before he dies." {n}Disappointed, Jae takes her hand off her weapon and bows her head before you penitently.{/n} "Forgive me my brazenness, shereen. He's all yours."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "In that case, pray to the Exalted One that Falco backs up your story before he dies." {n}Disappointed, Jae takes her hand off her weapon and bows her head before you penitently.{/n} "Forgive me my brazenness, shereen. He's all yours."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “既然如此，你就向至高无上的神皇祈祷吧，希望法尔科死前的供词和你说的一样。”{n}婕伊失望地将手从武器上移开，懊悔地向你低下了头。{/n}“请原谅我如此无礼，亲爱的。我不会再打扰你们谈话了。”
languages.original_text: "In that case, pray to the Exalted One that Falco backs up your story before he dies." {n}Disappointed, Jae takes her hand off her weapon and bows her head before you penitently.{/n} "Forgive me my brazenness, shereen. He's all yours."

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，你就向至高无上的神皇祈祷吧，希望法尔科死前的供词和你说的一样。”{n}婕伊失望地将手从武器上移开，懊悔地向你低下了头。{/n}“请原谅我如此无礼，亲爱的。我不会再打扰你们谈话了。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「その時は、ファルコが死ぬ前に話の裏付けを取るわ、エグザルテッド・ワンに祈りなさい」{n}失望したジェイは武器から手を放し、あなたの前で頭を下げた。{/n}「あたしの図々しさを許してちょうだい、シャリーン。彼はあなたのものよ」
languages.original_text: "In that case, pray to the Exalted One that Falco backs up your story before he dies." {n}Disappointed, Jae takes her hand off her weapon and bows her head before you penitently.{/n} "Forgive me my brazenness, shereen. He's all yours."

traits.locale_text: 「その時は、ファルコが死ぬ前に話の裏付けを取るわ、エグザルテッド・ワンに祈りなさい」{n}失望したジェイは武器から手を放し、あなたの前で頭を下げた。{/n}「あたしの図々しさを許してちょうだい、シャリーン。彼はあなたのものよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «En ese caso, ruega al Exaltado que Falco confirme lo que ha dicho antes de morir». {n}Decepcionada, Jae quita la mano de su arma e inclina la cabeza ante ti.{/n} «Perdone mi descaro, shereen. Es todo suyo».
languages.original_text: "In that case, pray to the Exalted One that Falco backs up your story before he dies." {n}Disappointed, Jae takes her hand off her weapon and bows her head before you penitently.{/n} "Forgive me my brazenness, shereen. He's all yours."

traits.locale_text: «En ese caso, ruega al Exaltado que Falco confirme lo que ha dicho antes de morir». {n}Decepcionada, Jae quita la mano de su arma e inclina la cabeza ante ti.{/n} «Perdone mi descaro, shereen. Es todo suyo».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Dann betet zum Erhabenen, dass Falco Eure Geschichte bestätigt, bevor er stirbt." {n}Enttäuscht nimmt Jae die Hand von der Waffe und verneigt sich reumütig vor dir.{/n} "Verzeiht meine Kühnheit, Shereen. Er gehört Euch."
languages.original_text: "In that case, pray to the Exalted One that Falco backs up your story before he dies." {n}Disappointed, Jae takes her hand off her weapon and bows her head before you penitently.{/n} "Forgive me my brazenness, shereen. He's all yours."

traits.locale_text: "Dann betet zum Erhabenen, dass Falco Eure Aussage bestätigt, bevor er stirbt." {n}Enttäuscht nimmt Jae die Hand von der Waffe und verneigt sich reumütig vor dir.{/n} "Verzeiht meine Kühnheit, Shereen. Er gehört Euch."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Alors, priez l'Exalté pour que Falco confirme vos dires avant de mourir. » {n}Déçue, Jae enlève sa main de son arme, puis se tourne vers vous et baisse la tête d'un air contrit.{/n} « Pardonnez mon impudence, shereen. Il est à vous, maintenant. »
languages.original_text: "In that case, pray to the Exalted One that Falco backs up your story before he dies." {n}Disappointed, Jae takes her hand off her weapon and bows her head before you penitently.{/n} "Forgive me my brazenness, shereen. He's all yours."

traits.locale_text: « Alors priez l'Exalté pour que Falco confirme vos dires avant de mourir. » {n}Déçue, Jae enlève sa main de son arme, puis se tourne vers vous et baisse la tête d'un air contrit.{/n} « Pardonnez mon impudence, shereen. Il est à vous, maintenant. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "O vakit Görkemli'ye dua et ki Falco ölmeden evvel dediklerini teyit edebilsin." {n}Düş kırıklığıyla elini silahından çeken Jae, pişmanlıkla başını eğiyor.{/n} "Edepsizlik ettim, bağışla şirinim. Senindir."
languages.original_text: "In that case, pray to the Exalted One that Falco backs up your story before he dies." {n}Disappointed, Jae takes her hand off her weapon and bows her head before you penitently.{/n} "Forgive me my brazenness, shereen. He's all yours."

traits.locale_text: "O vakit Görkemli'ye dua et ki Falco ölmeden evvel hikâyeni teyit edebilsin." {n}Düş kırıklığıyla elini silahından çeken Jae, pişman bir hâlde başını eğiyor.{/n} "Edepsizlik ettim, bağışla şirinim. Senindir."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
